kurzinfo: There are sodas made with mushrooms that supposedly improve mental clarity and juices packed with bacteria that claim to enhance digestive health. Water infused with collagen carries the promise of better skin, and energy drinks offer to help burn body fat. What started in the late 1980s with caffeine- and vitamin-laced energy drinks has grown into a multi-billion-dollar industry. Hundreds of brands are vying for consumersâ€™ attention with increasingly exotic ingredients and wellness-focused marketing.
